name: Bednar International
overview:
Bednar International Pty Ltd is a privately funded company which runs various online projects such as online stores, directories, auction sites and social communities. It’s primary source of income is from advertising and subscription sales.

Continually expanding, Bednar International Pty Ltd has is now breaking into the online adult industry with iwantandneedsex.com. The website offers a wide variety of services to visitors including an adult forum, sex stories, directory, a toy store and even the ability to watch hosted porn. The company wishes to grow the website by adding more features. To date, it has not asked for investor funding.
